results.description:
2nd, 3rd and 4th Thursdays of each month (except when there is a holiday) from 8-9:30AM we conduct our presentations, networking and business development meetings for entrepreneurs, consultants, salespeople and business owners in the NY Tri-state area. One catch – YOU bring your own coffee :-) (I will bring the bagels.)

Schedule for 2016

Bfast @AXA: 8-9:30AM

Happy Hour @Fatcat Billiards or Ainsworth Park 6-8PM

April 14, 21 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 28

May 12, 19 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 26

June 9, 16 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 23

July 14, 21 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 28

August 11, 18 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 25

September 8, 15 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 22

October 13, 20 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 27

November 10, 17 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 24

December 8, 15 (Bfast & Happy Hr), 22

We are much more than your average meetup group. We act as your own private business advisory council and potential funding pool. Members and attendees walk out each week with sound business advice, decades worth of experience, leads and introductions.

What is an entrepreneurs breakfast /business networking and development meeting? A meeting where you present your demo, meet various people from various industries and walk out with introductions, leads and referrals and business cards. Curious how do we do this? Come on down and find out...

AXA Advisors is located at: 1290 Ave of the Americas (bet 51 - 52nd St.) 
4th floor (Always check with security)

We charge $25.00 for all meetings ($20 via paypal if you RSVP early) unless you become a member at $500/year. (Your first meeting is free if you just want to check it out). Please bring business cards and your own coffee. ($20 payment here through paypal: http://bit.ly/1fDv0KA)

If you are interested in joining, please RSVP here. Please contact Raphi Salem at [masked] or call[masked] if you have any questions.

We are part of 5 meetup groups. Please check them out and join: 
http://www.meetup.com/NYC-Serious-Entrepreneurs-Only-Present-Get-Funded/
http://www.meetup.com/Entrepreneurs-NYC-Finance-Tech-Mktg-Sales-Expert-Advice/
http://www.meetup.com/Breakfast-Networking-USA/
http://www.meetup.com/NYC-Small-Business-Owners-Consultants-Salespeople/
http://www.meetup.com/Lunch-And-Focused-Networking/

We are also part of linked in. Please connect with me and join our groups: 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/websitemarketing
https://www.linkedin.com/grp/home?gid=2142515
https://www.linkedin.com/grp/home?gid=2792115

Thank you. I look forward to meeting you in person soon.

Raphi Salem 
SalemGlobal Internet, Website Marketing and Lead Generation 
www.SalemGlobal.com 
www.RaphiSalem.com 
[masked]
results.how_to_find_us: Check in on left side of lobby with AXA security. They will confirm 4th floor
results.name: NYC Roundtable Busines Networking & Advisory - Midtown @51st and 6th Ave

results.description:
-NEW MEMBER WELCOME- 


What is J-Kuru?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5we0xkpiKGA&feature=youtu.be

Come seize the day with us over a cup of coffee, a danish, and Japanese conversation at our early morning events! 

These casual gatherings are open for all levels of Japanese. We'll chat about a wide range of topics, from talking about daily life, to comparing our different cultures, and sharing tips we've learned while studying foreign languages.

！！！　Please RSVP　！！！

(Don't worry if RSVP's are low--we have members coming every day, so someone will always be there to meet you!)


Please check out our FACEBOOK page for event info and fun photos!

We look forward to meeting you soon!

J-KURU

results.description:
Join us for a play group in French open to all children ages 2-4 and parents/guardians of all language background. The play group will be led by a native French speaker who will lead children through various fun activities in French.  Bring your child and meet new people!

We will have our Meet-Up at École Internationale de New York, located in the neighborhood of Flatiron at 206 5th Avenue on the 2nd Floor from 9am to 10:15am. 

From 9am to 9:30am, parents will be able to enjoy coffee and chat while their child enjoys free playtime under the supervision of one of our French instructors.

From 9:30am to 10:15am, parents or guardians can join in the play group as our French instructor will lead children in stories, songs and games in French. 

Basic rules:

- 1 parent/guardian must stay with their child. Parents may bring siblings under the age of 2 if they will be under the supervision of the parent/guardian for the entire time.

- Children must be between 2-4 years old.

- Parents may arrive between 9-9:30am.  (We cannot accommodate parents before 9am).

- Please RSVP (at least 24 hours before the event).

- Maximum participants: 8 children.

results.description:
Six years of 10am Tuesday/Thursday Football at Mc Carren park!

Games start on time, please be there 10-15m before.

No sliding tackles, no corners, no CLEATS, small goals 7v7 games.

Bring a positive attitude and a Dark and White shirt.


Games are set up for 8v8 (32 attendees) but might go to 9v9 MAX. If games are full, they are full :) 

Be on time and remember the waiting list is not at all a guarantee to play!
results.how_to_find_us: The field is on Driggs Ave & Lorimer Street. Look for the field with the running track around it.
results.name: Thursday Morning Pick-Up McCarren Park 10 AM

meta.description: Searches for recent and upcoming public events hosted by Meetup groups. Its search window  is the past one month through the next three months, and is subject to change. Open Events is optimized to search for current events by location, category, topic, or text, and only lists Meetups that have **3 or more RSVPs**. The number or results returned with each request is not guaranteed to be the same as the page size due to secondary filtering. If you're looking for a particular event or events within a particular group, use the standard [Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/events/) method.
meta.title: Meetup Open Events v2
